languages.text: {n}Зауэрбэк отвечает, не сводя глаз со старика. Вы видите глубокие раны на ее груди и плече, но она, кажется, не замечает их.{/n} "Ударные группы зачистили боковые приделы от мутантов. Дрались они как безумцы, но выучка блюстителей фон Валанциус оказалась сильнее. Организованное преследование показало, что беглецов нет, огнеметные команды зачищают склеп. Выжившие выродки — отсутствуют".

{n}Sauerback's gaze remains trained on the mutant. You notice deep wounds on her chest and shoulder, but she shows no signs of acknowledging their existence.{/n} "Strike forces have cleared the side sections of mutants. The freaks fought like madmen, but they could not match the skill of the von Valancius enforcers. Once victory was secured, our pursuit units made sure that none would escape. Our flamer squads are in the process of purging the crypt. All degenerates confirmed dead."
languages.original_text: {n}Зауэрбэк отвечает, не сводя глаз со старика. Дрались они как безумцы, но выучка блюстителей фон Валанциус оказалась сильнее. Организованное преследование показало, что беглецов нет, огнеметные команды зачищают склеп. Выжившие выродки — отсутствуют".

languages.text: {n}Le regard de Sauerback reste rivé sur le mutant. Vous remarquez des blessures profondes sur son torse et ses épaules, mais elle semble à peine en avoir conscience.{/n} « Les forces d'intervention ont éliminé tous les mutants des sections latérales. Ces monstres se sont battus comme des diables, mais ils n'étaient pas de taille face aux prévôts von Valancius. Une fois la victoire acquise, nos unités de traque ont veillé à ce qu'aucun ne s'échappe, et nos escadrons purifient la crypte au lance-flammes à l'instant où je vous parle. Toutes les aberrations sont mortes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's gaze remains trained on the mutant. You notice deep wounds on her chest and shoulder, but she shows no signs of acknowledging their existence.{/n} "Strike forces have cleared the side sections of mutants. The freaks fought like madmen, but they could not match the skill of the von Valancius enforcers. Once victory was secured, our pursuit units made sure that none would escape. Our flamer squads are in the process of purging the crypt. All degenerates confirmed dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard de Sauerback reste rivé sur le mutant. Vous remarquez des blessures profondes sur son torse et ses épaules, mais elle semble à peine en avoir conscience.{/n} « Les forces d'intervention ont éliminé tous les mutants des sections latérales. Ces monstres se sont battus comme des diables, mais ils n'étaient pas de taille face aux prévôts von Valancius. Une fois la victoire acquise, nos unités de traque ont veillé à ce qu'aucun ne s'échappe, et nos escadrons purifient la crypte au lance-flammes à l'instant où je vous parle. Toutes les aberrations sont mortes. »

languages.text: {n}La mirada de Sauerback sigue fija en el mutante. Reparas en las heridas profundas que presenta en su pecho y hombro, pero ella no da señales de ser consciente de ellas.{/n} «Las fuerzas de asalto han despejado a los mutantes de las secciones laterales. Los monstruos han luchado como posesos, pero no son rival para los guardias von Valancius. Con la victoria asegurada, nuestras unidades de persecución se aseguraron de que ninguno escapara con vida. Nuestros escuadrones de lanzallamas están purgando la cripta en estos momentos. Confirmo la muerte de todos los degenerados».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's gaze remains trained on the mutant. You notice deep wounds on her chest and shoulder, but she shows no signs of acknowledging their existence.{/n} "Strike forces have cleared the side sections of mutants. The freaks fought like madmen, but they could not match the skill of the von Valancius enforcers. Once victory was secured, our pursuit units made sure that none would escape. Our flamer squads are in the process of purging the crypt. All degenerates confirmed dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada de Sauerback sigue fija en el mutante. Reparas en las heridas profundas que presenta en su pecho y hombro, pero ella no da señales de ser consciente de ellas.{/n} «Las fuerzas de asalto han despejado a los mutantes de las secciones laterales. Los monstruos han luchado como posesos, pero no son rival para los guardias von Valancius. Con la victoria asegurada, nuestras unidades de persecución se aseguraron de que ninguno escapara con vida. Nuestros escuadrones de lanzallamas están purgando la cripta en estos momentos. Confirmo la muerte de todos los degenerados».

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克的目光仍然紧紧地盯着眼前的变种人。你注意到她的胸口与肩膀上被抓出了深深的伤口，但她看起来像是毫不在意一般。{/n}“进攻部队已经把变种人的侧面区域清理干净了。尽管那群怪物像发了疯一样战斗，但他们根本不是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝执法者的对手。取得胜利之后，我们的追击部队确保没有敌人能逃出我们的掌心。目前，我们的焚化小队正在净化地下墓穴，所有变种人都已经确认死亡。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's gaze remains trained on the mutant. You notice deep wounds on her chest and shoulder, but she shows no signs of acknowledging their existence.{/n} "Strike forces have cleared the side sections of mutants. The freaks fought like madmen, but they could not match the skill of the von Valancius enforcers. Once victory was secured, our pursuit units made sure that none would escape. Our flamer squads are in the process of purging the crypt. All degenerates confirmed dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克的目光仍然紧紧地盯着眼前的变种人。你注意到她的胸口与肩膀上被抓出了深深的伤口，但她看起来像是毫不在意一般。{/n}“进攻部队已经把变种人的侧面区域清理干净了。尽管那群怪物像发了疯一样战斗，但他们根本不是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝执法者的对手。取得胜利之后，我们的追击部队确保没有敌人能逃出我们的掌心。目前，我们的焚化小队正在净化地下墓穴，所有变种人都已经确认死亡。”

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックの視線は変異体に向いていた。彼女の胸と肩に深い傷があるが、彼女はその存在を認める気配はない。 {/n}「打撃部隊が変異体のわき部分を一掃しました。怪物は狂ったように戦いましたが、フォン・ヴァランシウスエンフォーサーの技量にはかないませんでした。勝利が確保された際、我々の追跡部隊は誰も逃げられないようにしました。我々のフレイマー部隊は現時点で地下墓地を掃討中です。なお、すべての堕落者たちの死亡を確認しました」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's gaze remains trained on the mutant. You notice deep wounds on her chest and shoulder, but she shows no signs of acknowledging their existence.{/n} "Strike forces have cleared the side sections of mutants. The freaks fought like madmen, but they could not match the skill of the von Valancius enforcers. Once victory was secured, our pursuit units made sure that none would escape. Our flamer squads are in the process of purging the crypt. All degenerates confirmed dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックの視線は変異体に向いていた。彼女の胸と肩に深い傷があるが、彼女はその存在を認める気配はない。 {/n}「打撃部隊が変異体のわき部分を一掃しました。怪物は狂ったように戦いましたが、フォン・ヴァランシウスエンフォーサーの技量にはかないませんでした。勝利が確保された際、我々の追跡部隊は誰も逃げられないようにしました。我々のフレイマー部隊は現時点で地下墓地を掃討中です。なお、すべての堕落者たちの死亡を確認しました」

languages.text: {n}Sauerbacks Blick bleibt auf den Mutanten gerichtet. Tiefe Wunden sind auf ihrer Brust und ihren Schultern zu sehen, doch sie scheint deren Existenz gar nicht wahrzunehmen.{/n} "Einsatzverbände haben die seitlichen Bereiche von Mutanten gesäubert. Die Freaks haben gekämpft wie die Wahnsiningen, doch sie waren den Valancius-Enforcern nicht gewachsen. Nachdem der Sieg gesichert war, haben unsere Verfolgungstrupps sichergestellt, dass niemand entkommt. Unsere Flammenwerfertrupps sind dabei, die Krypta zu säubern. Alle Degeneraten sind tot."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's gaze remains trained on the mutant. You notice deep wounds on her chest and shoulder, but she shows no signs of acknowledging their existence.{/n} "Strike forces have cleared the side sections of mutants. The freaks fought like madmen, but they could not match the skill of the von Valancius enforcers. Once victory was secured, our pursuit units made sure that none would escape. Our flamer squads are in the process of purging the crypt. All degenerates confirmed dead."

Die Freaks haben gekämpft wie die Wahnsiningen, doch sie waren den Valancius-Enforcern nicht gewachsen. Nachdem der Sieg gesichert war, haben unsere Verfolgungstrupps sichergestellt, dass niemand entkommt. Unsere Flammenwerfertrupps sind dabei, die Krypta zu säubern. Alle Degeneraten sind tot."

languages.text: {n}Sauerback'in bakışları, mutanttan ayrılmıyor. Göğsündeki ve omzundaki derin yaraları fark ediyorsun ama onun bunların varlığından haberdar olduğuna dair bir işaret yok.{/n} "Saldırı kuvvetleri, yan bölümleri mutantlardan temizledi. Ucubeler delirmişcesine savaştı ancak von Valancius infazcılarının yeteneğiyle boy ölçüşemediler. Zafer kazanıldıktan sonra takip birimlerimiz, hiçbirinin kaçamamasını sağladı. Alevsaçan mangalarımız şu anda tüm mahzeni arındırmakla meşgul. Tüm bu yozlaşmış varlıkların öldüğü tasdiklendi."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's gaze remains trained on the mutant. You notice deep wounds on her chest and shoulder, but she shows no signs of acknowledging their existence.{/n} "Strike forces have cleared the side sections of mutants. The freaks fought like madmen, but they could not match the skill of the von Valancius enforcers. Once victory was secured, our pursuit units made sure that none would escape. Our flamer squads are in the process of purging the crypt. All degenerates confirmed dead."
